title: Sound On: Markets Tumble and Fiscal Cliff
itunes:title: Sound On: Markets Tumble and Fiscal Cliff
description:
Bloomberg Chief Washington Correspondent Kevin Cirilli delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

Guests: Mohamed Soltan, President of the Freedom Initiative, John Tamny Freedom Works Director of The Center for Economic Freedom/Editor of Real Clear Markets, Josh Green National Correspondent for Bloomberg Businessweek, Richard Fowler Nationally Syndicated Radio Show Host and Fox News Contributor, George Seay CEO of Annandale Capital, Texas businessman, and former senior advisor to Marco Rubio 2016 presidential campaign and Rep. John Garamendi, Democrat representing California's 3rd district.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
